head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TRAMONTANO, ANTHONY J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TRAMONTANO, ANTHONY J.

block.p: TRAMONTANO-Anthony J. On June 30, 2000, of Franklin Square, Long Island. Beloved husband of Beatrice; and devoted father of Anthony. Funeral Mass Monday, 10:30 AM at St. Catherine's RC Church. Interment Calverton National Cemetery. For information contact Franklin Funeral Home, Inc., 42 New Hyde Park Rd., Franklin Square.

TRAMONTANO-Anthony J. On June 30, 2000, of Franklin Square, Long Island. Beloved husband of Beatrice; and devoted father of Anthony. Funeral Mass Monday, 10:30 AM at St. Catherine's RC Church. Interment Calverton National Cemetery. For information contact Franklin Funeral Home, Inc., 42 New Hyde Park Rd., Franklin Square.
